text: 4:43 1 Samuel 14:48; 15:18Amalekian adarazir marazi fomɨra Israelian ara ghua danganir kamɨn iti. Ezɨ Simeonɨn anabamɨn gumaziba ghuava, Amalekian ikiavɨra itir varazira mɨsogha me dɨkabɨragha men danganim inigha an ikia iza datɨrɨghɨn tu.4:43 Akar kam, “iza datɨrɨghɨn tu,” a en dughiamɨn akam puvatɨ. A gumazir akɨnafarir kam osirimɨn dughiam mɨgei.
